author: Anna Medaris Miller
title: An American in Shanghai says the city isn't 'back to normal, but people feel safe again' as China's coronavirus cases drop
description: Emily and Matt Evans are Americans who've lived in Shanghai for about two years. While much of the rest of the world is struggling to control rapid accelerations in their novel coronavirus cases, the disease in China is on the decline. But the country remains…
content:
At 9 pm on a typical Saturday night in Shanghai pre-coronavirus, Emily Evans and her husband might listen to live music, go roller-skating at a pop-up rink, eat out at one of the city's 100,000-plus restaurants, or, likely, all three. 
"I wouldn't be inside … [+7349 chars]
